title: Riot just banned my alt account for no reason and then showed chat logs from someone else's account.
body:
Small indie game company, by the way. Literally no reason to ban the account what so ever and then essentially make up whatever they want to say we said that and get the account banned. I hadn't played on the account in 6 months, by the way. And then all of the sudden after a couple games, instabanned for logs that aren't mine.

Excellent system Riot. Proving exactly everything wrong with the game industry.

Aside from the sexism and poor pay.
